metadata.title: Calabria Slim Faux Leather Eye Glasses Case Soft | Eyeglass Case | Felt Lining | Slip-In | Black
features: SLIM SLIP-IN DESIGN | Sick of lugging around a bulky eyeglass case? With the slim yet sturdy design of these cases they will take up minimal space while being stored in your purse, bag or pocket. The slip-in design allows for easy accessibility to your favorite pair whenever they’re needed the most.
FLEXIBLE & PROTECTIVE | Crafted out of faux leather combined with bonded felt ling & over lock stitching, these cases provide the perfect balance of both flexibility & protection.
BLACK FAUX LEATHER | With the neutral black synthetic leather design, this case effortlessly pairs with any outfit & accessories. (1 BLACK CASE INCLUDED)
description: Our collection of cases may be the most extensive available. We offer practically every size of eyewear case from compact reading glass size to oversized cases for wrap-around sport glasses and Fit-Overs. Prices start at only $1 and our range of offerings extend to Top Quality Genuine leather made in Italy. Specialy items such as double cases, contact lens cases, children’s cases, belt cases, custom cases for Clic magnetic eyewear, and desktop eyeglass holders are all here at the best prices.

title: DO NOT BUY!
OLETHA Aesthetic Decor, Eyeglasses Case
Carson Eyeglass Pouch with Microfiber Cloth for Eyeglasses
